name: Full Materialization
description: Allow the creation of fully materialized nodes.

name: Mixed Comparisons
description: Enable experimental support for mixing equality and inequality comparisons on query parameters.

name: Pagination Support
description:
Enable experimental support for Pagination in dataflow.

NOTE: If enabled, this must be set for all ReadySet processes (both servers and adapters).

name: Post-Lookup
description: Enable experimental support for Post-Lookup (queries which do extra work after the lookup into the reader).

name: Straddled Joins
description: Enable experimental support for straddled joins (joins with partial keys traced to both parents).

name: Top K Support
description:
Enable experimental support for Top K in dataflow.

NOTE: If enabled, this must be set for all ReadySet processes (both servers and adapters).

name: Placeholder Inlining
description:
Whether to allow ReadySet to automatically create inlined caches when we receive a CREATE CACHE command for a query with unsupported placeholders.

If set, we will create a cache with literals inlined in the unsupported placeholder positions every time the statement is executed with a new set of parameters.
